text: Bhit Shah railway station (, Sindhi: ڀٽ شاھ ريلوي اسٽيشن) is a railway station located in the town of Bhit Shah, Sindh, Pakistan. ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways ==References== ==External links== *Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways Category:Railway stations in Matiari District
title: Bhit Shah railway station
